docs.summary: The Lottie element is used for embedding and customizing a Lottie animation.
description: The [Lottie](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-and-setting-up-ellipsis-text) element allows you to embed and customize your [Lottie](https://airbnb.design/lottie/) animation.

After adding the Lottie component to your site, change the `src` of the Lottie element to an external Lottie animation URL from any web location, for example, `'https://assets6.lottiefiles.com/private_files/lf30_vuxs5lpt.json'`, or to a valid Lottie JSON file imported to your page code.

Your Lottie JSON file should look something like this [animation.json](https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-web/blob/master/docs/json/animation.json) file. While your Lottie JSON file doesn't need all the key-value properties listed in this file, it must include the following properties and types for your Lottie JSON file to be valid.

To import the valid Lottie JSON file to your page code, create a new public js file for your valid Lottie JSON code. Then export the function from your public file and import it in your page code. Learn more about [exporting and importing functions](https://support.wix.com/en/article/velo-where-do-i-put-my-code#i-want-some-code-to-run-on-multiple-but-not-all-pages).
